data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Commewijne, Suriname to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Commewijne, Suriname
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Commewijne, Suriname the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, help 4 new simple churches start among the 24,800 people in the state of Commewijne, Suriname. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Commewijne, Suriname.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Saramaccan people might believe through him.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Commewijne, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Commewijne, Suriname honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Commewijne. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

location.name: Commewijne
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Cantonese, Arab, Syrian, Sikiana, Saramaccan, Matawari, Indonesian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Cantonese (6,800), Arab, Syrian (1,200), Sikiana (30), Saramaccan, Matawari (1,300), Indonesian (19,000)
